author: holiman
content: In geth, we have to "bump the pivot" every 15 minutes or so, as we close in on the chain head. When you're still fetching leaves, it's not that much of a problem, but once you start closing in on the upper levels (e..g, as you near completion), the pruning is more successfull / the higher-up-nodes get unreferenced more often, so the forced pivot movements are more common towards the end.
